value:
! Forbiden characters @ # % ^ / !@#$%^&*()
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '@', '(AT)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '#', '(HASH)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '%', '(PERCENT)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '^', '|')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '$', '(DOLAR)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '&', '(AND)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '*', '(STAR)')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '', '\')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '\
', '
')
!----------------------------------------------------------
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", "'", "|")
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '"', '|')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '{', '-')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '}', '-')
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", "&NL#", "
")
!:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", '(', '|')
!:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", ')', '|')

!---------------------------------------------------------- (0x09 00001001 HT (Horizontal Tab))
:SET &REQ_TEXT# = STR_SUBSTITUTE("&REQ_TEXT#", ' ', '|')
!---------------------------------------------------------- (0x0d 00001001 (Enter))
